primaryText: The actions are the data payloads
secondaryText: These are basically an object with a {TYPE} property that is mandatory and a {PAYLOAD} property that is optional
features: The {TYPE} should be a constant in the same file as the actions or in a action types file.
Action creators are functions that return an action
Never use Actions standalone always make action creators
A community convention and a good way to handle the payload of the action is to use a {PAYLOAD} named property
snippets: These are the snippets that I use to look when I work with a action in redux:
